QuestData.Title: Ysondre's Call
QuestData.Description: The dragons of nature... Heed her call, $n. Do not linger here. Her request for your aid is both a great honor and an omen of terrible danger.$B$BThe place she spoke of is called the Emerald Summit. A path off the main road through the Lower Wilds leads up one of the high stone plateaus; you will find a small shrine at the top.$B$BAll of Feralas may rest upon your shoulders. May the Earth Mother watch over you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ysondre at the Emerald Summit in the Lower Wilds.
QuestData.RewardText: You've come.$B$BI am ashamed to ask this of you, $c, but I've ran from him long enough. Taerar must be stopped.
